title: Add playable games accessible from game play button

requirements.summary: Create game selection interface accessible from play button showing Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, and Breakout
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the play button shows a list or grid of available games including Flappy Bird
All games (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, Breakout) are visible and selectable
Clicking on any game launches it in a playable state

file_operations.description: Add a third option 'Play Built-in Games' alongside 'Play Games' and 'Create Game' that opens the predefined game selection interface

Create a modal component that displays a grid of predefined games (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, Breakout) with game cards showing thumbnails, titles, and play buttons. When a game is selected, close the modal and launch GamePlayer with the selected predefined game template

Wire the PredefinedGameSelector modal into the GamesView route by adding state management for opening/closing the predefined game selector and passing it down to GameModeModal. When a predefined game is selected, open GamePlayer with that game

requirements.summary: Implement fully playable Flappy Bird 2D game with physics, obstacles, scoring, and game over detection
acceptanceCriteria: Bird responds to tap/click controls with realistic gravity and jump physics
Pipes spawn continuously and move from right to left
Score increments when bird passes through pipes
Game ends when bird collides with pipes or ground
Game can be restarted after game over

file_operations.description: Create a complete HTML/CSS/JavaScript template for a playable 2D Flappy Bird game. Include canvas rendering, bird physics with gravity and jump mechanics, pipe obstacle generation and movement, collision detection, score tracking, game over state, and restart functionality. Use the generated images at frontend/public/assets/generated/flappy-bird-sprite.dim_64x64.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/pipe-sprite.dim_64x128.png as sprites in the game rendering. Implement postMessage for score reporting to parent frame. Export as a string template

requirements.summary: Integrate Flappy Bird template into GamePlayer alongside existing Snake, Pong, and Breakout templates
acceptanceCriteria: Flappy Bird is available as a predefined game template in GamePlayer
Flappy Bird game loads correctly in the iframe player
High score tracking works for Flappy Bird
Game controls are responsive and smooth

file_operations.description: Import the flappyBirdTemplate and add it to the predefinedGames object with id 'flappy-bird', title 'Flappy Bird', description 'Navigate the bird through pipes', and the template code. Ensure the existing postMessage score handling and high score tracking works for Flappy Bird

Include Flappy Bird in the displayed game grid with appropriate metadata (title, description, thumbnail) alongside Snake, Pong, and Breakout. Ensure clicking the Flappy Bird card launches it in GamePlayer
